bug.author: opencv-pushbot
bug.summary: Image in sample seamlessclone are missing
bug.description:
Transferred from <denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/issues/4447>http://code.opencv.org/issues/4447</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>|| Laurent Berger on 2015-06-28 15:03 || Priority: Low || Affected: branch 'master' (3.0-dev) || Category: highgui-gui || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: Easy || PR: || Platform: Any / Any </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Image in sample seamlessclone are missing</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Image used in example https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/samples/cpp/cloning_demo.cpp are missing. Images are in this repository https://github.com/Itseez/opencv_extra/tree/master/testdata/cv/cloning/ </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>History</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Do a common user have right to solve it?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sturkmen72>@sturkmen72</denchmark-link> , if you meant "to close issue", no. I think, since the example code have corresponing <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/samples/cpp/cloning_demo.cpp#L20>image download instruction</denchmark-link> , we can close it.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mshabunin>@mshabunin</denchmark-link> i meant making PR for uploading images. it seems no need. thank you.
